title: Unyielding Diablo 4 player proves Sorcerers aren’t as bad as you thought
description: Blizzard don’t read this and nerf them, please.

title: Life By You, Paradox's open-world Sims-like game, is delayed to 2024
description: Early access was supposed to begin in September of this year, but has been pushed into March of the next one.

title: It's Glorbin' Time again! Now Destiny 2 players have tricked an AI site using the fake boss Glorbo
description: Last week, WoW players cooked up a fake boss to mess with AI-generated websites. Today, guardians got in on the fun.

title: This new 16-player '100% cooperative' survival game is inspired by Valheim, Terraria, and Minecraft
description: Codename: Islands is the working title for a new shared world survival game set on a "magical, living island."

title: I've tested the Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart PC port, and pending one fix, PlayStation might've nailed it
description: The PC version of Rift Apart has just about everything we want from a port, although some players are running into crashes.

title: Riot's 2v2 fighting game Project L still doesn't have a proper title, but it'll be playable in August at Evo
description: Riot Games offered a fresh look at the upcoming Project L today with a new developer diary and full-match gameplay vid.

title: Blizzard buzzkills fix Diablo 4's best bug
description: The Season Journey's pick-it-up-and-put-it-down trick no longer works.

title: The Little Big Adventure reboot has been cancelled because publishers just aren't interested
description: It turns out that the Twinsen games are a little too niche for their own good.

title: Baldur's Gate 3's narrator shares hilarious outtakes reel—'If you fancy Astarion, you might want to consider therapy'
description: I feel called out.

title: Despite the intense action, FromSoftware wants Armored Core 6 to have a 'dark old sci-fi feel' with a 'sense of loneliness and nostalgia'
description: FromSoftware tells us how longtime composer Kota Hoshino helps set each game's tone.

title: Lara Croft: The Art of Virtual Seduction is the ultimate cringey relic of late '90s game advertising
description: How Tomb Raider's early marketing campaigns objectified an icon.

title: I want this to be the most important breakthrough for computing, fusion, and batteries… but my hopes may have already been dashed
description: We keep hearing whispers of the superconducting material dreams are made of but they often end up Flubber.

title: The Great Mighty Poo from Conker's Bad Fur Day now has a statue the size of a human torso, and I have no idea where you could reasonably put it
description: Seriously, why is this thing so big?

title: Ubisoft has reportedly canned a sequel to flawed gem Immortals Fenyx Rising
description: Not so immortal after all.

title: 2005 called, it's asking if you want another Neopets trading card game
description: And my answer is yes, yes I do.

title: Boo, Intel's faux 14th Gen isn't going to deliver the peak cheap gaming CPU we were teased with
description: Pour one out for the 14-core budget chip that got away.

title: Behold, the 61.44 TB ruler drive capable of forming petabytes of storage in a single server
description: Only problem is you can't really stick one inside your PC.

title: World of Warcraft Classic feels the scourge of the WoW token as a ring is traded for $13,000 worth of in-game gold
description: Bids for a rare item shot into the millions during a recent GDKP auction.

title: Fan outcry pushes Pathfinder dev to delete new data-sucking tool and all its info one day after introducing it: 'The scale of the outburst surpassed worst expectations'
description: A patch to Wrath of the Righteous introduced a 3rd-party analytics tool and a new EULA, but fans were having none of it.

title: Remnant 2's upscaling settings are more necessity than nicety and players aren't happy about it
description: The game's developers have confirmed they "designed the game with upscaling in mind."

title: Cyberpunk and Witcher developer announces it's cutting 'roughly 9%' of its staff over the next 7 months
description: Around 100 people are losing their jobs between now and March.

title: AMD's mini Zen 4c cores explained: They're nothing like Intel's Efficient cores
description: Fully featured and with the same IPC, just smaller and more efficient.

title: TP-Link Archer AX6000
description: Extra-terrestrial visitor or Wi-Fi 6 router, or maybe a bit of both.

title: Minisforum's new mini-ITX PC lets you mount a GPU on top of the case
description: Like a giant flash drive, sort of.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #767: Wednesday, July 26
description: Today's Wordle: Help with the #767 puzzle.
